description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Solution Advisor:
              
              -	Initiate new Solution/features that maximize output values by making liaison between companies strategies, market needs and frontier technologies.
              
              -	Travel and coordinate with Sales team to present the solution and meeting with customer
              
              -	Investigate, select and drive other departments to develop new features/products
              
              -	Monitor market needs, forecast, set comprehensive product specification and priorities for new products
              
              -	Perform thorough analysis for opportunities, improvements and changes made to current company product line.
              
              -	Propose prototypes for new features and present them to Manager/Leader/Sale
              
              Pre-Sales Co-ordination:
              
              -	Provide Customer & Sales team with product consultancy
              
              -	Travel and provide technical support to develop product documents and product categories as requested by customer
              
              -	Co-ordinate with sales team in persuading and presenting products to customers.
              
              -	Co-ordinate sales campaign with partners & providers if requested
              
              -	Be the contact point with partners & providers for product and technical issues
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Foreigner who has at least 3-5 years working experience in IT industry / Software development
              
              -	Bachelor’s degree or higher in Information Technology/Telecommunication/Electronics, or similar areas.
              
              -	Experience in technologies used in banking and financial business are prefered
              
              -	Experience in full life-cycle of solution development
              
              -	Success record in software solution pre-sale, advisor
              
              -	Main communication in native English
              
              -	Have good presentation & negotiation skill
              
              -	Can work both independently and in team
              
              -	Work under high pressure & good interpersonal skill
              
              -	Team management skill is a plus.
              

              CVs in English (including most recent photo) to be sent via VietnamWorks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
